name: The Desiccated
description: Explore the world as everyone’s favorite unrooted plant—a tumbleweed! In The Desiccated, the player harnesses the wind in hopes of steering a tumbleweed to water. Various water sources will provide the player with new mechanics, such as the abilities to hover and wall jump. As players traverse various environments—from a ghost town to the beach—music and art dynamically change to fit the mood. The Desiccated pairs lonesomeness and despair with peaceful yet challenging gameplay.
